(We were kind of planning it, the Alliance DOESN'T want peace, Alloran, that 
could be very bad for them, and hell, they're Predacons, not to 
mention...Zardus seems to be recruiting more mad dog killer psychopaths as of 
late...sorry about Soundwave)

Scattershot/Dark One/Breakdown:



Scattershot landed, crashing onto Stalker's chest when he hit the ground.  
"Got him!" he yelled triumphantly, getting off the body.

Dark One walked over and kicked the dead Stalker in the left temple.  "This 
wasn't worth it!  I just got out of the CR Chamber!  You'll pay for that...oh 
wait," he laughed, "you already did!"

"And I got out of the CR chamber AFTER Dark One!" Breakdown fired off 5 
explosive rounds into Stalker's chest.

Scattershot and Breakdown loaded Stalker into Dark One's cockpit, Dark One, 
who was in his jet fighter mode, launched high into the air, reaching 200 ft 
in altitude, heading for the Alliance base.

Scattershot and Breakdown went by foot.
